description: This file is a C header file defining internal function prototypes for managing HTTP form content within a specific module of the RDK Management platform. It includes function declarations for interface handling, state management, form parsing, and form element management, indicating its role as an internal API interface for HTTP form content operations.

methods.name: HttpFcoGetHfpIf
methods.description: Retrieves the HTTP Form Content Interface handle associated with the object.

methods.name: HttpFcoSetHfpIf
methods.description: Sets the HTTP Form Content Interface handle for the object.

methods.name: HttpFcoReset
methods.description: Resets the HTTP Form Content Object to its initial state.

methods.name: HttpFcoEngage
methods.description: Enables the HTTP Form Content Object to engage in processing.

methods.name: HttpFcoCancel
methods.description: Cancels ongoing processing in the HTTP Form Content Object.

methods.name: HttpFcoGetUriParams
methods.description: Retrieves URI parameters associated with the form content.

methods.name: HttpFcoGetFormParam
methods.description: Fetches a specific form parameter by name.

methods.name: HttpFcoGetFormParam2
methods.description: Fetches a form parameter by name and returns its value and size.

methods.name: HttpFcoGetFormElement
methods.description: Retrieves a form element object by name.

methods.name: HttpFcoAddFormElement
methods.description: Adds a form element object to the form content.

methods.name: HttpFcoDelFormElement
methods.description: Deletes a specific form element by name.
